login.title: Login Required
login.description: You need to be logged in to benefit from this service. If you are not registered, the registration process only takes a few minutes.
login.smartpassText: SmartPass is your digital credential to access UAE government services
login.uaepassText: UAE Pass is the National Digital Identity solution for the UAE
departmentOfEconomicDevelopment.address: Baniyas Towers, Al Falah Street, Fatima Bint Mubarak Street 6, Abu Dhabi
default.title: Start Your Business
relatedJourneyDescription: The 'Manage Your Business' journey contains a consolidated dashboard for business owners and representatives to view and respond to actions, apply for services, and view company level insights for single or multiple businesses.
addEconomicActivity.title: Request to Create a New Economic Activity
addEconomicActivity.home.startLogin.desc: Request to create a new economic activity easily by clicking on Start.
addEconomicActivity.home.description: Through this service, you can request to create new economic activities on to your DED list of activities.
addEconomicActivity.home.title: Service Description
addEconomicActivity.home.process.title: Application Process
addEconomicActivity.addActivity.descript: Enter the details of the new economic activity you would like to request.
addEconomicActivity.getDEDApproval.descr: Upload the necessary documents in support of your application, as requested. Obtain approval from the Department of Economic Development.
addEconomicActivity.errorText: An error occured while completing your request. Please try again later.
addEconomicActivity.success.title: The Requested Activity Has Been Successfully Added
addEconomicActivity.success.subTitle: Your activity has been successfully added to the list. Please note that adding an activity with this service only adds this to the Department of Economic Development list of activities.   If you would like to add this to an existing licence or request for a new economic licence with this activity, please proceed with the next steps.
addEconomicActivity.other-links.title: Other Related Services
addEconomicActivity.other-links.request_: Customer Request to Create New Economic Activity
Request for Amending the Economic Licence - Trade Licence
Request for Issuing an Economic Licence
addEconomicActivity.waiting.title: Your Application Approval Is in Progress
addEconomicActivity.waiting.subTitle: Your application is currently being assessed by the Department of Economic Development for approval. You will be notified about changes to your application's status on the registered email address and through SMS on the registered mobile number.  You may also check the status of your application at any time by visiting the Manage Your Business dashboard.
addEconomicActivity.addAttachment.title: Economic Name Application Returned
addEconomicActivity.addAttachment.descri: Your application has been returned by DED. Please check the feedback below, by making the required amendments and/or adding the requested documents.  For other quesries, please contact TAMM support at 8005555 or alternatively, you can call the Department of Economic Development at +971 2 815 8888.
addEconomicActivity.addAttachment.file_t: File type: PDF  Size limit: 4 MB
addEconomicActivity.addAttachment.feedba: Please add an authorisation document in order to validate your request.
addEconomicActivity.user_form.title: Add Activity
addEconomicActivity.user_form.descriptio: Enter more details of the new activity your business would like to engage in. Once you have added this, please proceed to enter the applicant's  contact information. Note: Adding an activity with this service only adds it to the Department of Economic Development list of activities.
addEconomicActivity.user_form.verify_con: These details below will be used for all contact on this request.
addEconomicActivity.invalid_mobile: Please enter the mobile number in the correct format
addEconomicActivity.notice.subTitle: Your application approval is in progress.
continueProcess.title: You will be redirected shortly
continueProcess.content: Please be patient while we identify your application
addEconomicActivity.rejected.title: Your Application Has Been Rejected
addEconomicActivity.rejected.subTitle: Your application has been rejected by the DED. For any additional queries, please contact Department of Economic Development at +971 2 815 8888.
addEconomicActivity.desc.other-links.req: You can amend your existing licence to include this newly added activity.
